Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets

SASS is preprocessor for CSS

Which allow writing less code in more condense way

CSS Code

1

.parent {

2

display: flex;

3

justify-content: center;

4

margin-bottom: 2rem;

5

font-size: 1.4rem;

6

}

7

.parent .button {

7

background: #f00;

8

padding: 1rem 2rem;

9

cursor: pointer;

10

color: #222;

11

border-radius: .5rem;

12

}
